reporter_caption.center: WILSON CO. v. CRAB ORCHARD SPRINGS HOTEL CO., 238 Ky. 851 (1931)

caption.center: WILSON COMPANY v. CRAB ORCHARD SPRINGS HOTEL COMPANY.

opinion.posture: Motion for an appeal from Lincoin Circuit Court.
opinion.attorneys:
H.C. CLAY and KELLY J. FRANCIS for movant.
P.M. McROBERTS and K.S. ALCORN opposed.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment overruling exceptions to receiver's report on claim for $371.26.
Appeal denied; judgment affirmed.Page 852
